comment.author: 41490240@N06
comment._content: This would also appear to be a photo of Mohamed bin Abdullah Hassan's (the Mad Mullah) fort at Taleh in the Somaliland Protectorate. There is an almost identical photo published in Douglas Jardine's book The Mad Mullah of Somaliland taken before the RAF bombed it in 1920-21. The figure in the foreground is likely to be of  a member of the Dolbahantur tribe, and the Nur Mohamed  subsection whose watering area was around the fort.
